Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{3: "The city's central exhibition hall, which was taken by Iris Warbler, was built based on structures from different regions. Most of the data inside was removed following Cervantes' departure."}
{3: 'After confirming there was no valuable information left in the exhibition hall, Babylonia opened it to the Constellia residents as a museum showcasing human and mechanoid art.'}
{3: 'During the Paradise Festival, the main hall in the center has been temporarily transformed into a grand stage capable of accommodating thousands.'}
{3: 'There are human and mechanoid performances on the stage every day of the Paradise Festival. Anyone who has signed up in advance has a chance to showcase their talents.'}
{3: 'But the event everyone looks forward to the most is undoubtedly the grand finale of the festival, the "Joint Show" that closes out the celebration.'}
{3: 'The Paradise Festival lasts half a month, the longest duration WGAA could secure without affecting production on the surface.'}
{3: 'This arrangement is meant to allow as many people to participate as possible, but it also gives Karenina a final opportunity to polish her performance.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: 'WGAA Constellia Branch', 2: 'Recording Studio. 10:30 AM.'}
{3: 'Recording studio, WGAA Constellia Branch. 10:30 AM.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Your smile here is too superficial. It needs to be more impactful.', 4: '1', 18: '100002293'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Why don't you make a heart with your hands here? It's going to catch everyone's eye.", 4: '1', 18: '100002294'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Won't it be too weird?! I know we've seen that a lot in many performances, but... What do you think, Commandant? Will it look unnatural?", 4: '2', 18: '100002295'}
{2: '(Give her a thumbs up)', 3: '25', 4: '(Shake your head)', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "See? It will look great! And if we're trying to emphasize the contrast, why don't you make the heart gesture with a disdainful expression...", 4: '1', 18: '100002296'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Uh... Will people really like it?', 4: '2', 18: '100002297'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Ahem! Someone has raised an objection. I think we should respect the opinion of our "producer," right?', 4: '2', 18: '100002298'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Sigh... That's so boring. Fine, we'll redesign this part of the performance...", 4: '1', 18: '100002299'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory463.jpg'}
{1: 'Constellia Temporary Cafeteria', 2: '11：55PM'}
{3: 'Constellia Temporary Cafeteria. 11:55 PM.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "You've all worked hard! I've prepared some Kowloong noodles for you. Please enjoy them while they're hot.", 4: '1', 18: '100002300'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Thank god. I'm starving... mentally speaking.", 4: '2', 18: '100002301'}

{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I\'ve also brought some special batteries for you, Kiske. The vendor said it\'s "maple syrup bread" flavored, but I\'m not exactly sure how that tastes...', 4: '1', 18: '100002302'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "Thank you so much! Are these from Oscar's? Their trickle charging is the best. It always leaves me wanting more.", 4: '1', 18: '100002303'}
{2: "(Chew) What are these toppings? They're so soft and chewy.", 3: '48'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "Oh, these are sliced pig intestines and duck blood puddings. They're very popular rice noodle toppings in some Kowloong regions.", 4: '1', 18: '100002304'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What...?! Are you saying that this is—', 4: '2', 18: '100002305'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "What's wrong? Do you not like it?", 4: '1', 18: '100002306'}
{2: '(Swallow quietly)', 3: '56', 4: "I think it's quite delicious.", 5: '56'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I've never had these before! Can I have another bowl, Hanying? I need to analyze its flavor more closely!", 4: '1', 18: '100002307'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory458.jpg'}
{1: 'WGAA Constellia Branch', 2: 'Photography Studio. 4:20 PM.'}
{3: 'Photography studio, WGAA Constellia Branch. 4:20 PM.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey, do we really need to take these many photos? Shouldn't two or three be enough for the promotional materials?", 4: '1', 18: '100002308'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Of course they are necessary! We need a set for internal use, another one for public advertising, and one for posters. We might even make a photo album if the photos are well-received.', 4: '2', 18: '100002309'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'A photo album?! We never discussed that!', 4: '1', 18: '100002310'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "A photo album?! Can Thunder Sparks publish one too? I'll make sure every mechanoid we know buys a copy!", 4: '1', 18: '100002311'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Can't you aim higher, Kiske?", 4: '1', 18: '100002312'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'If we can make it happen, the final proceeds will be split 70-30 between WGAA and you. Based on past experience, we should be able to make this much...', 4: '2', 18: '100002313'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'For real?! This is enough to renovate every workshop the Engineering Force has on the surface!', 4: '1', 18: '100002314'}
{2: 'To save the ever-declining Engineering Force, Karenina decides...', 3: '83'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Are you really asking me to decide?!', 4: '1', 18: '100002315'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: 'WGAA Constellia Branch', 2: 'Recording Studio. 2:40 PM.'}
{3: 'Recording studio, WGAA Constellia Branch. 2:40 PM.'}
{3: 'Stumbling through various minor incidents, this makeshift team of artists finally makes it to the last day of the Paradise Festival.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Staring at her performance on the tape, Karenina clenches her hands slightly as her left foot fidgets nonstop.'}
{3: 'Hanying and Kiske are both busy today, and Ayla just got dragged away by an overwhelmed Sica to handle the piled-up work at WGAA.'}
{3: 'Fortunately, all arrangements for the performance have been completed. It is now your job as the "producer" to confirm the final effects.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What do you think? Anything else that needs adjusting?', 4: '1', 18: '100002316'}
{2: "It's perfect.", 3: '97', 4: 'Maybe start thinking about how to do your autographs?', 5: '97'}
{3: 'Having watched the tape, you nod at Karenina and give her a thumbs up.'}
{3: 'But Karenina does not appear convinced by what you said.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Is there really no problem? I feel like I can still improve my dance moves during the chorus...', 4: '1', 18: '100002317'}
{2: 'I really like the way it is.', 3: '102'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Is that so... Fine. You\'re the "producer."', 4: '1', 18: '100002318'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "We've done everything we can. I suppose I can relax for a bit...", 4: '1', 18: '100002319'}
{2: 'What did you say?', 3: '107'}
{3: 'Startled by your sudden approach, Karenina immediately jumps away, the Inver-Device on her head flashing red.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What I mean is, Commandant, have you had fun these days?', 4: '1', 18: '100002322'}
{3: "Karenina's sudden question leaves you briefly stunned. When you come back to your senses, the memories of the past few days begin to unfold."}
{2: "I've had a great time.", 3: '115', 4: 'It was a bit tiring, but it was fulfilling.', 5: '115'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's good to hear.", 4: '1', 18: '100002323'}
{3: 'Seemingly reassured, Karenina rests her hand on her chest, and her Inver-Device lowers.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "There's nothing to do now but wait. Ayla told me I should conserve my energy before the performance.", 4: '1', 18: '100002324'}
{3: 'Karenina needs to calm down now and wait in patience so she can be at her best.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Why don't we head out for some fresh air, then? Let's see if there is anything new on the last day—", 4: '1', 18: '100002326'}
{3: 'Right then, you hear a crowd suddenly clamoring outside.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You look toward where the noise comes from and see a young couple surrounded by a crowd of onlookers.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The young man kneels on one knee before his partner, who looks surprised and flushed.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Young Man', 3: "I'm sorry I can't give you the grand wedding you deserve. The least I can do is to tell you how I feel in front of everyone in this city on this festive day.", 4: '2', 18: '100002329'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Man', 3: "I don't know if there will be another chance after today. I don't want to have any regrets.", 4: '2', 18: '100002330'}
{1: '1', 3: 'He takes out a silver-colored ring made from aluminum and reaches out to his beloved.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Woman', 3: "I... Do you know how long I've waited to hear that...?", 4: '1', 18: '100002331'}
{1: '1', 3: 'They embrace each other as the crowd around them offers their blessings. Some mechanoids even start to play the "Wedding March" with their speakers.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{3: 'Karenina cannot stop thinking about what just transpired when she steps out of the WGAA branch.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'He... he actually p-proposed here...', 4: '1', 18: '100002333'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "There were so many people watching... Didn't they feel embarrassed...?!", 4: '1', 18: '100002334'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "But isn't it also quite wonderful?", 3: '151'}
{2: 'Making a lifetime commitment on such a special day...', 3: '152'}
{2: "It's surely going to be an unforgettable memory for them.", 3: '153'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hmph. I didn't say it was bad.", 4: '1', 18: '100002335'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'A lifetime... It sounds long, but there are indeed things worth remembering your whole life.', 4: '1', 18: '100002336'}
{3: 'Karenina looks up, shielding her eyes with her hand from the glaring sunlight.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It's already the last day...", 4: '1', 18: '100002337'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Have I really done everything I can...?', 4: '1', 18: '100002338'}
{3: 'Lost in thought, Karenina notices a few life-sized standees with her likeness by a sign that guides tourists to the central exhibition hall.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The posters are out already, huh? They still look too over the top...', 4: '1', 18: '100002339'}
{2: 'I think they look great.', 3: '167', 4: 'Can I take one of the standees home later?', 5: '169'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I-I wasn't fishing for compliments!", 4: '1', 18: '100002340'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'W-what are you planning?', 4: '1', 18: '100002341'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'And why are there so many people here? This is a much bigger crowd than the one on the first day.', 4: '1', 18: '100002342'}
{3: 'The crowd from earlier has yet to disperse. Observing the people on the streets, Karenina realizes for the first time just how many people have gathered in the city.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Are they all here... for the show?', 4: '1', 18: '100002343'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A mother and her daughter walk by at that moment. The mother dresses like a doctor from a conservation area, and the girl looks to be around seven or eight.'}
{3: 'The girl has an old but well-maintained camera hanging around her neck. Leading the girl by her hand, her mother frequently stops and kneels down when the girl takes photos.'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'Mom, is today the last day of the festival...?', 4: '2', 18: '100002344'}
{2: 'Female Tourist', 3: "Yeah, but I heard there's going to be a big show tonight. It'll be a lot of fun.", 4: '1', 18: '100002345'}
{2: 'Female Tourist', 3: "Your father has work to do this time, so make sure you're taking a lot of pretty pictures for him, okay?", 4: '1', 18: '100002346'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl', 3: 'Mom! Look! Is that the lady on the poster...?', 4: '2', 18: '100002348'}
{3: 'The girl suddenly notices Karenina standing nearby and the posters by the sign.'}
{2: 'Female Tourist', 3: "Oh? You're right...", 4: '1', 18: '100002349'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'Miss! Miss! Can I take a photo for you?', 4: '2', 18: '100002350'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The girl is already standing before Karenina by the time she comes to her senses.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Tourist', 3: 'H-hi... Can I have your autograph?', 4: '1', 18: '100002352'}
{3: "The girl's approach seems to have triggered something. More and more people begin to gather around Karenina."}
{2: 'Fashionable Woman', 3: "Oh dear! Aren't you—", 18: '100002354'}
{2: 'Female Journalist', 3: "Excuse me! I'm hoping to ask you—", 18: '100002355'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Wait! Please... give me some space—', 4: '1', 18: '100002356'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Excuse me! Move! Move, please—!', 4: '1', 18: '100002358'}
{3: 'Karenina throws you a pleading look. You immediately step forward, shielding her from the surging crowd.'}
{2: 'Calm down, everyone.', 3: '215'}
{2: 'Female Journalist', 3: "Who are you? What's your relationship with this lady?", 18: '100002359'}
{2: "I'm her producer. You can direct your questions to me.", 3: '217'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You cast a reassuring glance at Karenina, signaling her to leave first and let you handle the tourists.'}
{3: 'Karenina nods back, squeezing her way out of the suffocating crowd and quietly slipping away down the street...'}
{3: "Until she disappears from everyone's sight."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{1: 'Church of Machina', 2: 'Great Hall'}
{3: 'Great Hall, Church of Machina.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before a subterminal of the Gray Tower stands a mechanoid in an old-fashioned top hat. He interfaces with the tower, exchanging information with the constant flow of data inside it.'}
{3: 'After the Gray Tower verifies the authentication code in his memory shell, he logs into his Gray Tower account for the first time in a very long period.'}
{3: "This is a backdoor he set up during the inception of this massive data terminal. Only Arcana, who is Sagemachina's agent, and mechanoids with Arcana's status are allowed access."}
{3: 'It bypasses all firewalls and encryption set by the Gray Tower, granting most security clearance to the user so they can freely access or extract information stored within the Gray Tower.'}
{3: 'It also comes with a small additional feature—a chat room that allows mechanoids connected to the Church of Machina network to communicate with each other across distances at any time.'}
{3: 'This is how he has been able to stay in touch with his compatriots from the Church during his decades of wandering.'}
{3: "Upon reaching the old site of Constellia, his teacher's legacy, he also installed a subterminal in the city that is capable of sharing computing power with the Gray Tower."}
{3: 'It was his insurance policy to ensure the safety of the awakened machines in Constellia in case of emergencies.'}
{3: 'He once entrusted the clearance of the subterminal to Dulcinea, but now—'}
{3: 'A sonic boom breaking the sound barrier erupts in the open space outside the Church, signaling the landing of "Power", Sagemachina\'s ride.'}
{3: 'Shortly after, a young girl with gray hair pushes open the gate and runs over to Cervantes with a smile upon seeing him standing before the Gray Tower.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Cervantes, I'm back! I got what you sent me!", 4: '2', 18: '100002360'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Welcome back, Sage. The Empress was talking about it with me just now. Is she not back with you?', 4: '1', 18: '100002361'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'She said she had to continue her "business trip." Nanami was planning to sneak—to lend her a hand but then decided to come back first.', 4: '2', 18: '100002362'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '"Neo Universal Toys"... How curious. Has she made any money at all...? All her messages to us were texts like "I\'m bankrupt again!"', 4: '1', 18: '100002363'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami is rooting for her! She's the only one who understands how valuable Nanami's collection of all-gen Flash consoles is! Besides, didn't she just organize a major event in the company's name?", 4: '2', 18: '100002364'}

{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "...And it's in Constellia. After avoiding her for so many years, she finally got her way. All I did was ask her to take Dulcinea away and hand over the key of the subterminal to you.", 4: '1', 18: '100002365'}
{3: 'During a casual chat, Dulcinea mentioned to Cervantes that she wanted to see the world beyond Constellia and travel to different places like Cervantes once did.'}
{3: "Though surprised by Dulcinea's idea, Cervantes ultimately encouraged her to follow her heart."}
{3: "So he asked the Empress to take Dulcinea away when passing through Constellia in one of her many travels and hand the temporary clearance for the Gray Tower's subterminal to Nanami."}
{3: 'But the Empress has clearly taken this opportunity to secretly start a business venture in Constellia called the Paradise Festival.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: "She was always talking about building a theme park in that city... I guess her wish has finally come true, then. I'm just not sure how things will turn out...", 4: '1', 18: '100002366'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Don't worry. Isn't Hanying there as well? I did ask her to watch over our friends in the city.", 4: '2', 18: '100002367'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Hanying is a prudent person. I do trust her...', 4: '1', 18: '100002368'}
{3: 'In a way, it is inevitable that Cervantes and the Empress are adversaries.'}
{3: 'Whenever the usually humble and polite Cervantes was heard arguing loudly with someone in the Church, it was always with the Empress.'}
{3: 'Perhaps "artists" and "capitalists" are natural enemies. Cervantes only asked for her help this time because he had no other choice.'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '"Paradise Festival"... It might sound odd coming from me, but why is she so fixated on it?', 4: '1', 18: '100002369'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Is this momentary "happiness" a "necessary" pursuit for mechanoids and humans right now? If so, what\'s the meaning of it?', 4: '1', 18: '100002370'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hmm... Cervantes, you're overthinking this! Your parts are going to age faster if you keep being sour all day!", 4: '2', 18: '100002371'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I seem to hear that a lot... Sage, would you mind enlightening me?', 4: '1', 18: '100002372'}
{3: 'Cervantes looks troubled. He has been trying to recenter himself since he returned from Constellia, but old habits die hard.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm not thinking too hard about it! Just because something's not necessary doesn't mean we can't have it!", 4: '2', 18: '100002373'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I might be doing something important right now... something "meaningful," as you would say, but I also don\'t see a problem with spending some time playing video games every day.', 4: '2', 18: '100002374'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'No one can stand being serious all the time, be it mechanoids or humans!', 4: '2', 18: '100002375'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's why we need a stage like this for people to do things they've been wanting to do but couldn't.", 4: '2', 18: '100002376'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Some opportunities are lost forever if we miss them, and that would leave regrets behind, wouldn't it?", 4: '2', 18: '100002377'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: "A moment of joy can be cherished for a lifetime. My parents often took me to the amusement park when I was young! I haven't forgotten about those memories.", 4: '2', 18: '100002378'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Yeah... No matter what the Empress thinks, I also want to create memories like this for everyone in the Church.', 4: '2', 18: '100002379'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Anyway, I'll go notify everyone now. Cervantes, can you set up the communication channel?", 4: '2', 18: '100002381'}
{3: 'Watching the spirited girl leave the hall, Cervantes focuses his attention back to the Gray Tower.'}
{3: 'A prominent message is pinned by the Empress in the chat room, with a countdown reminding everyone how long it is until the grand finale of the Paradise Festival.'}
